history.text: Certified as an excellent technology evaluation company

members.name: Jennifer
members.text: There is a great deal of difference between an eager man who wants to read a book and the tired man who wants a book to read.

members.name: Amelia
members.text: When I am attacked by gloomy thoughts, nothing helps me so much as running to my books. They quickly absorb me and banish the clouds from my mind.

members.name: Morgan
members.text: The reading of all good books is like a conversation with the finest men of past centuries.

members.name: Austin
members.text: I really had a lot of dreams when I was a kid, and I think a great deal of that grew out of the fact that I had a chance to read a lot.

members.name: Justin
members.text: Time is like a river. You cannot touch the same water twice, because the flow that has passed will never pass again. Enjoy every moment of your life.

members.name: Gemma
members.text: If I have ever made any valuable discoveries, it has been owing more to patient attention, than to any other talent.
